# Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this game, I've tried to be genuine, strategic, and fair. I've built real connections with many of you, focusing on finding common ground rather than creating divisions. 

While I've had to make difficult voting decisions, I've always tried to be transparent about my reasoning. I never targeted anyone out of spite or personal dislike.

I believe I've played with integrity while still being strategic. If you value honest gameplay and authentic connections, I hope you'll consider keeping me in the game.

Thank you all for the journey we've shared.
